title: Prohibits payments from the Judicial Supplemental Support Fund to certain judges for expenses for services and goods
summary: Prohibits payments from the Judicial Supplemental Support Fund to certain judges for expenses for services and goods to support such judges in the performance of their judicial responsibilities.
actClause: AN ACT to prohibit certain payments from the Judicial Supplemental Support Fund for the purpose of reimbursing judges for expenses related to services and goods in support of their judicial responsibilities
